text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Central Repository" means the Criminal Justice Information System Central Repository of the Department of Public Safety and Correctional Services.
"Certification card" means a card issued by the Secretary under § 13-406 of this title to an individual certified as a private detective.
"Firm member" means a partner of a partnership or an officer or director of a corporation.
"License" means, unless the context requires otherwise, a license issued by the Secretary to conduct a business to provide private detective services.
"Licensed private detective agency" means, unless the context requires otherwise, a person who is licensed by the Secretary to conduct a business that provides private detective services.
"Private detective" means an individual who personally provides private detective services.
"Private detective agency" means a person who conducts a business that provides private detective services.

section.section:
"Provide private detective services" means to provide, for compensation, the service of:
conducting an investigation that concerns:
securing evidence for use before any investigating committee, board of award, or board of arbitration or for use in the trial of any civil or criminal cause;
nonuniformed personal protection; or
conducting an investigation to locate or apprehend a fugitive from justice, unless the person:

text.section: "Representative member" means a firm member who is appointed under § 13-302(b) of this title to act on behalf of the firm.
"Secretary" means the Secretary of State Police.
